word: I present to you eternal life. Will you have it? If so, here is the condition and blessing: "Blessed are they that do His commandments, that they may have right to the tree of life, and my enter in through the gates into the city" [Revelation 22:14]. May God help you to enter is my prayer.--Ms 38, 1886, pp. 1-6. (Sermon, "Whom Are We Following?" November 11, 1886.)
